headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: anchor_ids
parameters.description: A list of anchor IDs. Max size: 100. If anchor_ids is not passed, all anchors within the TTO Creator Marketplace account will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: ≥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: anchors
fields.description: A list of anchors.

fields.name: anchor_id
fields.description: The ID of the anchor.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the anchor. Enum value: DRAFT : The anchor is in draft mode. CREATED : The anchor has been created but has not been under review. IN_REVIEW : The anchor is under review. APPROVED : The anchor has passed review. REJECTED_BY_AUDIT : The anchor was rejected during the review.

fields.name: anchor_type
fields.description: The type of anchor. Enum value: WEB_ANCHOR : Webpage anchor. A type of anchor through which you can display your website link above the creator's video description.

fields.name: anchor_sub_type
fields.description: Returned when anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR . The specific type of webpage anchor. Enum value: DESTINATION : Web destination link. This type directs viewers to a web destination link that can be opened in TikTok. The anchor shows up both in the creator's video and the comment section. ECOMMERCE : E-commerce template. This type directs viewers to an internal landing page where brands can add a coupon link. The anchor shows up only in the creator's video comment section. ENTERTAINMENT : Entertainment template. This type directs viewers to an internal landing page where brands can add a video clip. The anchor shows up only in the creator's video comment section.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: The code of the country or region. The app information from this country or region's app store will be used. This anchor won’t be available in other countries or regions. To learn about the country or region that the code represents, see Location code .

fields.name: call_to_action
fields.description: Anchor link information.

fields.name: landing_page_url
fields.description: The URL of the page that the anchor will redirect viewers to. This page shows more information about your product or service.

fields.name: ios_download_link
fields.description: The iOS download link where people can download your app. When anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR , this field will be null.

fields.name: ios_deep_link
fields.description: The iOS download deeplink where people can download your app. When anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR , this field will be null.

fields.name: android_download_link
fields.description: The Android download link where people can download your app. When anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR , this field will be null.

fields.name: android_deep_link
fields.description: The Android download deeplink where people can download your app. When anchor_type is WEB_ANCHOR , this field will be null.

fields.name: anchor_title
fields.description: The title of the anchor.

fields.name: anchor_name
fields.description: The name of the anchor.

fields.name: anchor_sub_title
fields.description: The title of the anchor, which is used to tell TikTok users what you're promoting about your product or service. When anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION , this field will be null.

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: The thumbnail URL for the anchor.

fields.name: coupon_link
fields.description: This field returns a non-null value only when anchor_sub_type is ECOMMERCE . Information about the coupon link that redirects users to a page with more information about your campaign discount.

fields.name: discount
fields.description: Discount. For instance, a discount of 5 means 5% off.

fields.name: coupon_url
fields.description: Coupon URL.

fields.name: coupon_code
fields.description: Coupon code.

fields.name: pixel_id
fields.description: The ID of the pixel that measures and analyzes campaign performance.

fields.name: creator_preview_url
fields.description: The preview URL of the anchor and landing page that you can use for mobile phone preview purposes. The URL won't expire.

fields.name: advertiser_preview_url
fields.description: The mobile preview URL of the anchor and landing page that you can use for desktop preview purposes. The URL won't expire. When anchor_sub_type is DESTINATION , this field will be null.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination Information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Current page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total number of pages.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "anchors": [
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": "{{advertiser_preview_url}}",
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": "{{anchor_sub_title}}",
                "anchor_sub_type": "ENTERTAINMENT",
                "anchor_title": "{{anchor_title}}",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "TW",
                "coupon_link": null,
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "pixel_id": null,
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            },
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": "{{advertiser_preview_url}}",
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": "{{anchor_sub_title}}",
                "anchor_sub_type": "ECOMMERCE",
                "anchor_title": "{{anchor_title}}",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "US",
                "coupon_link": {
                    "coupon_code": "",
                    "coupon_url": "",
                    "discount": 5
                },
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            },
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": null,
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": null,
                "anchor_sub_type": "DESTINATION",
                "anchor_title": "Watch Now",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "CA",
                "coupon_link": null,
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "pixel_id": "7258197703320944642",
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            }
        ],
        "page_info": {
            "page": 1,
            "page_size": 50,
            "total_number": 3,
            "total_page": 1
        }
    }
}
